item.title: Enable UFW
item.description: To turn on UFW, sudo ufw allow 22 sudo ufw enable sudo ufw status sudo systemctl enable ufw sudo systemctl start ufw

item.title: Install and configure fail2ban
item.description: Derived from here: sudo apt install fail2ban sudo systemctl enable fail2ban sudo systemctl start fail2ban sudo systemctl status fail2ban enter interactive mode
